title: Interpretation of drinking coffee in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of drinking coffee in a dream is our topic today, we will refer to everything related to the science of interpreting interpreters and different ideas and opinions, about coffee that occupied people's minds and questions and made them search for it online. Coffee is generally considered one of the traditional and favorite drinks for many people, so we will show you in our article different interpretations of this vision that suit the cases of visions, so follow us. Read more: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of drinking coffee in a dream Interpretation of drinking coffee in a dream Drinking coffee in a dream is considered one of the good signs for the visionary and portends good and near comfort, but of course it differs according to the condition of the visionary. When a person sees in his dream that he is drinking coffee in a public cafe with other people, this indicates his recklessness and lack of responsibility. While seeing the dreamer drinking coffee in his home means calm, reassurance, peace of mind and stability in his social and professional relationships. Read more: Seeing pins in a dream Interpretation of seeing coffee in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpreter Ibn Sirin believes that a person's vision of coffee and drinking it in a dream is one of the good things that indicate good and getting out of distress to near comfort God willing, and changing his bad circumstances to good. He also interpreted a person’s vision of coffee and its spilling from him in his dream as evidence of his success and achieving his goals and achieving them without facing difficulties, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of an unmarried woman who sees coffee in her dream also included different elements and opinions, such as hearing good news from unmarried women about her life matters and her desire to get married in the coming days. While if an unmarried woman sees coffee spilling in her dream, this symbolizes the interest of people related to her life and they are planning to destroy her life and plans. Read more: Piano in a dream Meaning of seeing coffee in a married woman’s dream A married woman’s vision of coffee in her dream is considered one of the important topics interpreted by dream interpreters, as this vision carries within it many signs that indicate goodness and stability in the life of a married woman. Whoever sees that she is drinking coffee in her dream indicates her good treatment of her husband and the understanding between them and the stability of their married life. But a married woman who sees coffee in a dream and drinks it with someone other than her husband means that she is deviant in performing her duties towards her husband and in anticipation of problems and conflicts Between them. Read more: The project in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman drinking coffee in her dream? The meaning of the interpretation of seeing coffee in a pregnant woman's dream can vary. When a pregnant woman sees coffee in her dream, this means that she suffers from anxiety, fear, and inability to make the right decisions about her life issues, and a sense of hesitation and lack of self-confidence. As for seeing a pregnant woman drinking coffee and drinking it in a dream, it has many different interpretations. When you see her drinking coffee from a healthy cup, this indicates that her life affairs will decline and

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing the desert in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing that you are walking in the desert and saw in front of you a wide place? This means that your life with your family is full of contentment and happiness. What does it mean to see yourself walking in the Sahara Desert? A sign of nourishment in this world, it can indicate traveling to a new place that is beneficial to you. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself walking in the Sahara Desert? Interpretation of seeing the desert in a dream for a married woman? It means loneliness and sadness. What is the purpose of seeing the desert full of monsters and wild animals? This means that you are approaching a lady of bad reputation and behavior. What is the interpretation of seeing the desert, its colors are beautiful, flowers, green and happy? It means following a diet Wide-ranging after struggle and fatigue. Interpretation of seeing the desert in a dreamThe desert in a dream means goodness and happiness according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. If the desert has a beautiful color and has flowers, green and happy, this means following a wide-ranging diet that you will get after struggle and fatigue. The desert symbolizes travel And transportation. Perhaps your dream means that you are traveling for work or to change your residence. Walking in the desert and seeing the place wide in front of you means that your life with your family is full of satisfaction and happiness. A dream of the desert for a man. A dream of the desert “the desert” for a single man is evidence of a chaste wife who fears God Almighty, especially if he sees that this is a desert. It has no end, and it will be as beautiful as he saw it in the beauty of the desert in his dream. If a single man sees the land is bad and its appearance is ugly, his wife will be ugly. A dream in the desert for a married man means change and means that your family situation will change for the better. I hope you live a happy life with your wife and end the problems and fights between you and her. Calm will prevail in your family. After a period of stress and tension, the desert in a dream is a “world” and the doors of sustenance open before you. Perhaps you had a great opportunity to travel because the desert was an ancient symbol of travel. Interpretation of seeing the desert for a woman: The desert in a dream for a married woman means loneliness and sadness, and she sees that she is walking alone in the desert, and this is evidence that she She does not feel intimate in her marriage. Perhaps because she bears her responsibilities and her husband does not feel her problems. So the interpretation of the desert in a dream for a single woman is an indication that she is an anxious girl in her life. Perhaps the reason is the pressure of her parents to marry, and the desert is a good vision. This means the end of these obstacles and you will have a wedding soon. As for The desert in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her birth will be easy, she will have nice children with her, and her upbringing will improve and she will be blessed with kindness. A dream of getting lost in the desert. Getting lost in the desert in a dream means the loneliness that you feel in society. If he finds flowers in the desert, this means that you know a man New and of high status. Walking in the desert is a sign of sustenance in this world. It can indicate traveling to a new place that is better for you. The desert symbolizes a woman. Then seeing loss and walking in a barren desert, means that he will work in a place where there is humiliation or serve as a hated and unjust person. Then seeing the desert full of monsters and wild animals, means that you are approaching... A lady with a bad behavior. To dream of the desert in a dream full of roses and plants

title: Interpretation of seeing uncovered hair in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about revealing hair in a dream for a single woman is one of the most common dreams that many girls have, especially since the hijab is imposed on every girl and she feels confused when she sees herself revealing her hair in a dream. So what does this vision mean in one dream? Are its connotations directed towards goodness or is it a warning of a problem or something like that? What is the interpretation of uncovering hair in a dream for a single woman? If a girl sees that she is removing her hair covering, this indicates her relationship and marriage, but if she reveals her hair in front of a stranger, this means that she will start a new life. She marries this man and lives a happy life. With him. If a single woman sees that she is showing her hair in a dream, the vision is a warning that there are many wrong decisions in her life and she must review them. A girl seeing her hair exposed in front of strangers is considered undesirable and may foretell bad luck or reveal a secret or bad words said about her. Revealing hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. If an unmarried woman sees her hair uncovered in front of people she does not know, this may symbolize the delay of her marriage or her relationship with someone she did not know before, and if her hair appears in a dream and many people see it. Strangers, this is an undesirable thing that warns her of her involvement in a problem. Plucking hair in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the appearance of hair is a sign of the jacket and that the owner of this dream is a religious and respectable person, but revealing hair symbolizes bad morals in the person with whom she intends to associate and his distance from him. . Religion. Interpretation of seeing hair in a dream for a married woman? Revealing hair in a dream. If a married woman sees that she is revealing her hair in front of people, then this vision portends the emergence of many problems with her husband, which may lead to separation. Some jurists also mentioned that revealing hair without seeing it is a sign of pregnancy soon. It also indicates her stability in her life with her husband and her happiness with him. If a married woman dreams in her dream that she is uncovering her head, then her vision symbolizes that her husband will stay away from her for a period of time and will work abroad. While a married woman dreams that her veil has been burned or cut, then That is a bad omen that portends a misfortune to her husband or the appearance of some bad things that will harm her husband or make him seriously ill. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site.

title: Interpretation of a dream about jinn in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a jinn by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a person turning into a jinn in a dream as a person hated by the people around him. Seeing a person turning into a jinn in a dream may indicate that people were conspiring against him. Seeing a wizard of jeans in a dream is a sign of getting... On a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing a genie in human form in a dream. Whoever sees a genie in a dream in the form of a human, this indicates the presence of a person in the life of the dreamer who does not know him or cares about him. Interpretation of seeing jeans being beaten in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is killing the genie or beating him. In a dream, it shows how intelligent the dreamer is and how knowledgeable he is about his enemies. And seeing the genie who takes human form in the dream shows how strong the dreamer is and the inability of his enemies to overcome him. Interpretation of feeling fear towards the jinn in a dream: Whoever dreams that he feels fear of the genie in the dream shows the instability of the psychological state of the dreamer. The dream is that he is suffering from psychological and social imbalance and disorder. Interpretation of seeing a jinn wearing jeans in a dream. Whoever sees that in a dream he is wearing jeans, this indicates his bad psychological state and the many problems that he suffers from. Seeing jeans wearing on the human body can indicate the extent of feelings of despair, loneliness, and dissatisfaction with God’s judgment. Whoever sees in a dream that he is teaching the jinn to recite the Holy Qur’an in the dream, this indicates the extent of goodness that exists within the dreamer and may indicate the acquisition of a lot of money and abundant goodness in the life of the dreamer, or the acquisition of a position and a position of prestige. The dream also indicates the reputation of the doctor. For the dreamer among the people. Whoever sees in a dream that the jinn is standing in front of his house, this indicates a great loss for the dreamer and that he will be exposed to a crisis and great distress in his real life. Interpretation of the jinn entering the house in a dream: Whoever dreams that jeans enter his house, this indicates that there is someone waiting for him. As for whoever sees the genie entering the house and breaking things in the house or doing work for it, this indicates the entry of thieves and being robbed. And whoever sees jeans outside the house on the doors or windows, this dream has three interpretations in his family. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations. About seeing jeans in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of the color of the sky in a dream?

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the color of the sky in a dream in this article. The color blue is a calm, beautiful color that relaxes the eye when looking at it, and its appearance in a dream in its different shades in different situations expresses many interpretations that differ from one person to another, and from one interpreter to another, and it does. You do not know the invisible except for God Almighty. For this reason, we should not delve into researching the different interpretations of the dreams that we see, and in this article today in the encyclopedia, we show you the interpretation of the color of the sky in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of the color of the sky in a dream: The heavenly color is one of the shades of blue, and the connotations of the color blue in its different shades are similar except In some cases we mention in today’s article. Interpretation of the color of indigo in a dream. Muhammad Ibn Sirin explained the color blue, or the so-called color indigo, as follows: The color indigo, or the color of the sky, symbolizes purity, chastity, and love for others. If a person sees in a dream the color of the sky . This expresses the happiness, pleasure and joy that exists in the place where the dreamer is located. Seeing the color of the sky symbolizes a feeling of psychological stability. Wearing light clothing and the sky color are praiseworthy visions that indicate a feeling of happiness and joy. The color blue indicates the color blue has many associations that we present below: If one sees the color of the sky in his dream, then this dream expresses that the dreamer is a reliable person, with good morals and character. Seeing the color of the sky in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a trustworthy person. The appearance of the color of the sky in the dream also means that the dreamer keeps secrets. If one sees the color of the sky In a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is characterized by honesty, cooperation, and helping those around him in the most difficult times, such as illness, sadness, etc. Also, seeing the color of the sky indicates the approaching marriage, happiness, and the presence of offspring. If one sees the color blue in his dream. This expresses the progress and high status of the pioneer. Interpretation of the color of the sky in a dream for a single woman: Seeing one girl the color of the sky in a dream represents the abundant money that will come to her through work. If an unmarried girl sees the color of the sky in a dream. This reflects the success achieved by this girl in her professional life. Also, seeing the color of the sky in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes the good reputation that the girl enjoys, apart from her beautiful works that express good morals and her good conduct. If the girl sees the sky color; This indicates her desire to get married. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a long blue dress for single women: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a blue dress. This symbolizes the optimism, calm, and psychological peace that this girl feels. Interpretation of the color of the sky in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the color blue in her dream, this represents a lot of goodness that will soon come to that woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is wearing a sky dress. This expresses the goodness, happiness and comfort that will come to her soon. Seeing a woman in a dream with her husband

title: The only thing you need to look for is to discover in detail the interpretation of a dream about a tiger

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about a tiger. What are the signs of seeing a tiger in a dream? There are positive, disgusting, and negative connotations, and because we at the specialized Egyptian website respect the readers’ requirements in interpreting their dreams, we decided in this article to list all the interpretations proposed by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. To the following paragraphs, follow them to know what your dream means? Now we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a tiger. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger: Killing a tiger in a dream indicates victory and courage, and if the dreamer’s life is full of enemies, then this dream portends victory over them, their exit from his life, and their defeat. If the dreamer eats a piece of tiger meat in a dream, then this is an upcoming job for him in his work and it will be He has a word for people to hear. If the dreamer sees that he is taking care of tigers in his house and raising them as we raise young children, then the vision indicates the dreamer’s feelings towards someone changing from hatred to love, and in a clearer sense if the dreamer is in a fight with a person and there is great enmity between them, then the scene appears The end of hostility and the creation of close friendship will last for years. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger by Ibn Sirin. The tiger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin has a bad interpretation and means the dreamer’s sadness and feeling of injustice because of someone who has money, power, and social status. The appearance of a large number of tigers to the dreamer indicates that he is in contact with vile people and their behavior is reprehensible, and Ibn Sirin described them as They will see that they are disrespectful and committing indecency. If the dreamer manages to defeat the tiger in his dream, this indicates his victory in life over a strong opponent who posed a great danger to him. If the dreamer is sitting in his house and sees a strong tiger approaching him, then he is dealing with an evil person on a religious level. Morally, this person entered the dreamer’s house and may intend to destroy his life. Therefore, the dreamer must soon, after what he saw in the dream, ask well about the people he takes to his home so as not to betray him. The interpretation of the dream of the little tiger according to Ibn Sirin shows well if he is calm and sits next to the dreamer without harming him and that the livelihood that will come to the dreamer will be friends. Strong financially and professionally and will provide him with support in his life. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a single woman. A tiger in a dream for an unmarried woman is tempted by evil if it is killed From him, because the dream is interpreted by the verbal insults that she hears from her father or from the person who takes care of her in her life. If she sees a tiger attacking her and her brother confronts him until he kills him and saves her, this indicates that her brother will stand with her in the upcoming dilemmas of her life. If the dreamer can cause fear in A tiger until she sees it running strongly, then she will be so successful in her life that she will get a promotion at work that a girl of her age rarely gets. If the fiancée sees a ferocious tiger in her dream and is very afraid of it, then she may suddenly quarrel with her fiancé and will unfortunately move away from him. There are positive, disgusting, and negative connotations, and because we at the specialized Egyptian website respect the readers’ requirements in interpreting their dreams, we decided in this article to list all the interpretations proposed by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. To the following paragraphs, follow them to know what your dream means? Now we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a tiger. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger: Killing a tiger in a dream indicates victory and courage, and if the dreamer’s life is full of enemies, then this dream portends victory over them, their exit from his life, and their defeat. If the dreamer eats a piece of tiger meat in a dream, then this is an upcoming job for him in his work and it will be He has a word for people to hear. If the dreamer sees that he is taking care of tigers in his house and raising them as we raise young children, then the vision indicates the dreamer’s feelings towards someone changing from hatred to love, and in a clearer sense if the dreamer is in a fight with a person and there is great enmity between them, then the scene appears The end of hostility and the creation of close friendship will last for years. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger by Ibn Sirin. The tiger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin has a bad interpretation and means the dreamer’s sadness and feeling of injustice because of someone who has money, power, and social status. The appearance of a large number of tigers to the dreamer indicates that he is in contact with vile people and their behavior is reprehensible, and Ibn Sirin described them as They will see that they are disrespectful and committing indecency. If the dreamer manages to defeat the tiger in his dream, this indicates his victory in life over a strong opponent who posed a great danger to him. If the dreamer is sitting in his house and sees a strong tiger approaching him, then he is dealing with an evil person on a religious level. Morally, this person entered the dreamer’s house and may intend to destroy his life. Therefore, the dreamer must soon, after what he saw in the dream, ask well about the people he takes to his home so as not to betray him. If she sees a tiger attacking her and her brother confronts him until he kills him and saves her, this indicates that her brother will stand with her in the upcoming dilemmas of her life. If the dreamer can cause fear in A tiger until she sees it running strongly, then she will be so successful in her life that she will get a promotion at work that a girl of her age rarely gets. title: Interpretation of the Saudi riyal in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Saudi riyal is one of the things that has been researched recently, and of course the interpretation of this vision varies according to the condition of the riyal, as well as according to the social status of the viewer and the importance of money in general. I will shed light on it in this article and you will pay more attention to this issue. Interpretation of seeing the Saudi riyal In a dream, seeing the Saudi riyal in a dream indicates the abundant and plentiful goodness that the dreamer will receive in the future, God willing, and it also indicates the good psychological state that will soon dominate the dreamer’s life. If one sees the Saudi riyal in a dream, the narration indicates great financial gains or success. It is great for the fortuneteller’s plans, God willing, and if the fortuneteller is suffering from many worries or suffering from depression and unhappiness, then the vision foretells imminent death from this worry and sadness, God willing. Interpretation of the Saudi riyal in a dream by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing the Saudi riyal in a dream indicates The time of rest approaches and the end of worries and problems. This vision may also indicate the many doors of goodness that will be opened before the dreamer, and if the dreamer is planning important events in his life, the vision heralds the success of those plans, God willing. Come here.If one sees the Saudi riyal in a dream, it means that he will obtain a high academic degree. It also indicates a promotion to a job or obtaining another job that is higher and better than the current job, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of the Saudi riyal in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing the Saudi riyal in a dream for a single woman suggests that she will get something that she has longed for for many years, and if the single woman sees If he gives her a Saudi Riyal or more, it means that he will give it to her. The near future is a good and reformed man, and her marriage will speed up, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees the Saudi riyal during sleep, this means that she will enjoy a beautiful and peaceful life full of manifestations of happiness, luxury and joy. Interpretation of a dream of 500 Saudi riyals for a single woman: Seeing 500 Saudi riyals for a single person indicates the approaching date. Her marriage to God Almighty also indicates the joys that await her. Some interpretive scholars also see that 500 Saudi riyals in one dream indicates great livelihood and many good things that await her in the future. If an unmarried woman wants to seize the opportunity or aspire to a specific thing, the vision shows that she will get that, but she has to She works, toils, and creates everything valuable and valuable in order to move forward and get what she wants. Interpretation of seeing the Saudi riyal in a dream for a married woman. The Saudi riyal in a dream shows a married woman that she will get rid of the crises that she suffers from in her life at all levels. If a married woman sees the Saudi riyal, this indicates her great wisdom and good thinking that will make her excel over all her competitors. Also, the vision can be good news about reaping rewards after work, hard work and perseverance, and...

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone flying, seeing flying in a dream

preview.html: A dream about flying for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man and an unmarried man, whether he is rising from the ground, using wings or wings over the sea, over people and lands. I dreamed that I was flying in the air about Ibn Sirin and more Some of the basic elements of interpreting flying in a dream, most of which are very positive. It can mean rushing into your positive feelings and feeling free, happy, liberated and free. The nature of flying dreams varies, it may be flying with your hands or sitting on a magic carpet or if you are flying over sand, mountains, flower fields or a volcano and all of these things will have different meanings and interpretations. As long as you fly in the sky and do not fall, this indicates safety and happiness. Interpretation of a trip in a dream Whoever sees himself flying in the air in his dream, and he intends to travel, this indicates a trip for him, and this trip will be successful and he will achieve what he wants, and complete the tasks assigned to him. Unemployment and lack of work can affect him and indicate pessimism and depression that afflicts its owner. Whoever sees himself flying with a wing on his back in a dream, this indicates comfort at the highest levels, pride and calmness for him, and travel without trouble and fatigue. Whoever sees himself flying in a dream and this person is arrogant about the reality of his life, this indicates the invalidity of his vision and this is self-talk that he is superior to people. Whoever sees himself flying from the top of a building or roof to the top of another building or roof in his dream, this indicates that he moves from the highest degrees to higher than that and remains at a high height and place, and whoever sees himself flying from the bottom of a building or from the ground to the top of the building or to the sky, this indicates achieving his goal and reaching the highest levels. Whoever sees himself flying in an air race with a group of competitors and was ahead in his dream, this indicates that he will defeat his enemies and achieve many of the achievements he aspires to. Whoever was a slave or servant and saw himself flying in his dream, this indicates liberation from service and freedom, that is, liberation and freedom. Whoever sees himself flying, then disappearing among the clouds In the sky, then he does not leave a trace and does not return after his escape in the dream, this indicates death and separation, and he leaves his family forever. Whoever sees himself flying with birds in the sky in his dream, this indicates the company of strangers. If a person sees himself flying in a dream while he is actually imprisoned, this indicates that he will be released from his prison and meet his family after years of imprisonment. Whoever sees himself flying over high mountains in his dream, this indicates a kingdom for him and he will defeat his competitors without difficulty and luck will be on his side. Whoever sees himself flying in a dream without swinging or swaying, this indicates his scale and that his affairs will go easily without effort. He flies with his feet up and his head down, this indicates that he is exposed to evil and illness. Whoever was competing for power or presidency and saw himself flying in his dream, this indicates that he assumed power and presidency and his victory over his competitors. Whoever was sick and saw himself flying in a dream, this indicates that you will die after an illness that was killing him. Whoever sees himself flying

title: What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating magic in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating magic in a dream? Seeing magic in a dream is one of the things that causes a lot of anxiety and stress to the dreamer, and he is desperate to know the interpretation of this dream and to know what this frightening dream shows. He must be careful and interpret. To see eating magic in a dream can be defined as follows: When a person sees that he is swallowing an enchanted leaf in a dream, this indicates that he is enchanted with food and drink, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When a person sees a magic leaf under the pillow in a dream, this indicates the presence of a disorder that is causing It has a husband and wife, which indicates magic from the family and relatives. If one sees that he discovers a magic paper in a dream, this indicates the discovery of a secret that will spoil the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin There are some interpretations that the scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted regarding seeing magic in a dream And all of these interpretations can be identified as follows: Ibn Sirin explains that seeing magic in a dream indicates that the dreamer is following the desires of the world and committing many sins. Seeing magic in a dream means that there are enemies trying to harm the dreamer. A person seeing magic in a dream leads to The separation of the spouses and the presence of some family problems that will worry him in the coming period. When you see a magic key in a dream and get rid of it, this indicates that there are enemies for that person and they are trying to harm him. If you see an open magic key in a dream, this may mean that you will get rid of a serious illness and recover from it. When You see the same person performing magic in a dream, it means that this person has malicious intentions, and loves to harm people and seeks it. If a person sees in a dream that he is bewitched, this indicates that he is an unjust person and is persecuting some of his family members. When a person sees that, it indicates a designated place To practice magic, this indicates that this person commits sins and evil and follows his desires. And whoever sees that magic is buried in his house, this indicates that there are people who hate him and are trying to enter his house to harm him. When a person sees that his house is the house in which magical works are performed, this indicates That the residents of that house practice heresies and superstitions. If one digs in a dream in his house to take out magic and actually finds it, this indicates that all members of the house will suffer serious harm. In the event that you see magic being removed from the house, this indicates the end of worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing magic in A dream for a married woman: The interpretation of a married woman seeing magic in a dream has many connotations and interpretations, and these interpretations can be presented as follows: When a married woman sees magic in a dream, this indicates many problems and obstacles that she will face in the coming period. If she sees heat in a dream, this It indicates the presence of someone who wants to harm her. If this magic is buried in the dream of a crowned woman, this indicates this woman’s lack of commitment to her worship and her distance from God Almighty. When a married woman sees herself affected by a magical way in a dream, this indicates the failure of her marital relationship. If she sees Married women break the spell
